name: Nelson L. Max
content: Max, Nelson – Computer Science Home Distinguished Professor Nelson Max Department of Computer Science 3108 Kemper Hall University of California Davis, CA 95616 Email: max at cs.ucdavis.edu Phone: (530) 752-3798 CV with full list of publications Research Professor Max’s research interests are in the areas of scientific visualization, computer animation, realistic computer graphics rendering, and multi-view stereo reconstruction. In visualization he works on molecular graphics, and volume and flow visualization, particularly on irregular finite element meshes. He has rendered realistic lighting effects in clouds, trees, and water waves, and has produced numerous computer animations, shown at the annual ACM SIGGRAPH conferences, and in OMNIMAX at the Fujitu Pavilions at Expo ’85 in Tsukuba Japan, and Expo ’90 in Osaka Japan. He is a member of the IEEE, and Eurographics, and a Fellow of the ACM. Comments are closed.
